thread.title: Wildwood testing new tramcar engine

author: Tom MacDonald
title: Wildwood testing new tramcar engine
text:
See All Homes of the Day "The tramcars were built for the 1939 World's Fair," he said. "They have been in continuous service on the Wildwood Boardwalk since 1949, which obviously entails a lot of wear and tear. We have successfully replicated two of the passenger trains in the past several years, and we are working on building a replacement engine." Go to Newsworks.org for more on the temporary tramcar changes.
